title: Financial Year Master Setup
summary: One-time annual setup activity for defining financial year parameters including start/end dates, FY code, and assessment code. Mandatory setup that must be created annually.

title: Tax Codes Configuration (CGST/SGST/IGST)
summary: Configure individual tax components for GST calculations including CGST, SGST, and IGST. Set up tax rates, agencies, purchase/sales accounts, and effective dates.

title: Tax Groups Setup
summary: Combine multiple tax codes (CGST + SGST or IGST) into consolidated groups. System automatically calculates combined rates based on line-level selections.

title: HSN/SAC Code Creation
summary: Define Harmonized System of Nomenclature (HSN) codes for goods and Service Accounting Codes (SAC) for services. Tax rates auto-populate on transactions when codes are selected.

title: TDS Master Configuration
summary: Configure Tax Deducted at Source (TDS) rules and rates including section codes, threshold limits, assessee codes, and special provisions for non-PAN holders and 206AB rates.

title: Item Master GST Setup
summary: Pre-configure GST details on inventory items including HSN/SAC codes, nature of item, GST units, and tax rates for automatic population on transactions.

title: Account Master GST Setup
summary: Set up GL accounts with GST parameters including nature of item, HSN/SAC codes, ineligible GST flags, and RCM applicability for automatic population in transactions.

title: Expense Categories Setup
summary: Configure expense categories with default GST parameters including nature of item, HSN/SAC codes, and RCM applicability to streamline expense entry.

title: Customer Master Creation
summary: Set up customer master records with GST and PAN details for invoicing. Configure GSTIN, GST registration type, state codes, and multiple addresses.

title: Vendor Master Creation
summary: Set up vendor master records with GST, PAN, and TDS configurations. Map TDS types, configure lower deduction certificates, and set up special provisions like 206AB.

title: Location Master Configuration
summary: Define company locations/branches with GSTIN for multi-location GST compliance. Configure location-wise GSTIN at both body and address level for proper tax calculation.

title: Subsidiary GST Configuration
summary: Configure GST details at subsidiary level for entity-wide settings. Set up master GSTIN, addresses, and entity-level tax parameters.

title: Sales Invoice Creation
summary: Create sales invoices with automatic GST calculation and compliance. Configure customer, location, line items with HSN/SAC codes for automatic tax computation based on intra-state or inter-state rules.

title: E-Invoice (IRN Generation & Cancellation)
summary: Generate IRN (Invoice Reference Number) and QR code for GST compliance through government E-invoice portal. Includes IRN generation process and 24-hour cancellation window procedures.

title: Vendor Bill Creation (with TDS/RCM)
summary: Record vendor bills with GST, TDS, and RCM calculations. Apply TDS deductions, configure reverse charge mechanism, and handle multiple billing addresses with automatic tax computation.

title: TDS Payment Processing
summary: Process TDS payment to tax authorities and generate challan records. Search transactions, mark for payment, enter bank and BSR details, and create TDS challan with complete audit trail.

title: TDS Challan Details
summary: View, manage, and verify TDS challan records with complete audit trail from bill to payment to challan. Drill down into vendor bills, payment records, and bank details.

title: TDS Bill Payment Report
summary: Generate filtered reports of TDS payments by date and type. Useful for reconciliation and verification before filing returns with detailed vendor-wise breakdown.

title: Tax Company Info Setup
summary: Configure company details required for E-TDS return filing including TAN, PAN, company name, address, responsible person details, and deductor information.

title: E-TDS Return Generation
summary: Generate E-TDS return files for submission to government TRACES portal. Select financial year, quarter, generate file, download when completed, and update with acknowledgment details.

title: Quarterly TDS Return Report
summary: Generate quarterly TDS summary reports with filtering options by date range, subsidiary, location, quarter, TDS section, and assessee type for compliance verification.

title: TCS Configuration & Application
summary: Configure and apply TCS (Tax Collected at Source) as per Income Tax Act provisions on sales transactions. Set up TCS rules, rates, thresholds, and 206CCA higher rates for non-filers.

title: TCS Report
summary: Generate comprehensive TCS collection reports for filing and reconciliation. View all TCS transactions with customer details, rates applied, and cumulative tracking.

title: Ineligible GST (Blocked ITC)
summary: Handle blocked Input Tax Credit scenarios where GST cannot be recovered under Section 17(5) of CGST Act. System posts GST back to expense account instead of ITC account.

title: AG Reports (GSTR-1, GSTR-2, GSTR-3B)
summary: Generate statutory GST returns and compliance reports including GSTR-1 (sales), GSTR-2 (purchases), and GSTR-3B (summary return) with filtering options and Excel export.
